Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Laramie
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Central, Augusta, Laramie, & Division, due to street blockage near Division/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Central, Augusta, Laramie, & Division, due to street blockage near Division/Laramie.

Allow extra travel time.
